meanings.sent1: The unstamped letter was returned to the sender.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the unstamped envelope on the table.
meanings.sent3: The unstamped package played hide and seek with the postman.
meanings.sent4: His unstamped passport left him stranded at the border.
meanings.sent5: The unstamped document seemed suspicious to the customs officer.

meanings.sent1: He couldn't mail the unstamped postcard.
meanings.sent2: The unstamped letter needed additional postage.
meanings.sent3: The unstamped package missed the stamp party.
meanings.sent4: Her unstamped ticket caused a delay at the entrance.
meanings.sent5: The unstamped envelope stood out in the mailbox.

meanings.definition: Not approved or certified by a stamp.
meanings.sent1: The unstamped contract was not valid.
meanings.sent2: She realized the unstamped certificate was incomplete.
meanings.sent3: The unstamped permission slip went on an adventure.
meanings.sent5: The unstamped document lacked official recognition.
